title: Manohari Emerald and Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut Diamonds and vibrant Emeralds. Features a deep blue gem at the bottom
possibly a Sapphire. Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish and lasting shine.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases exquisite floral and peacock motifs intricately woven together in a traditional design. The central pendant features detailed filigree work and is finished with a droplet gemstone adding movement and elegance. The alternating emerald and diamond pattern adds depth and visual interest. The setting style enhances the brilliance of each stone.
colors: accented by the rich green of the Emeralds
and the deep blue gem dangling from the pendant creating a harmonious color palette.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement of timeless elegance.
description: This Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a legacy piece. The intricate design, high-quality gemstones, and expert craftsmanship reflect the rich cultural heritage of South India. The combination of traditional motifs with a modern aesthetic makes it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Its durable construction ensures it will be cherished for generations.
